thread.title: Shanghai Disney Resort’s First Chinese New Year Celebration
thread.title_full: Shanghai Disney Resort’s First Chinese New Year Celebration

author: Thomas Smith
title: Shanghai Disney Resort’s First Chinese New Year Celebration
text:
Can you hear the Golden Rooster crowing? Chinese New Year is just around the corner, and Shanghai Disney Resort is already celebrating with guests around the world thanks to a bounty of limited-time entertainment, decorations, merchandise and festive menus to indulge in holiday favorites.
Guests can venture past a gleaming Golden Rooster icon into the Gardens of Imagination for a drum ceremony and dragon dance, then take a stroll to admire the beautifully adorned Year of the Rooster mosaic at Garden of the Twelve Friends . All around the resort, specially designed photo locations provide the perfect opportunity for endless snapshots.

The holiday spirit continues over an exquisite feast at Lumiere’s Kitchen , as well as a delectable variety of dining options across the resort. Those looking to buy gifts for loved ones will also find an abundance of unique merchandise, including coveted Lunar New Year Lucky Bags filled with goodies.
Guests can end the night with a special New Year blessing projected onto Enchanted Storybook Castle , a truly magical way to cap off the wonderful holiday season. Best wishes to everyone in the New Year!
